doc.name: WindowPropertiesAttribute
doc.description: This attribute stores properties of a window, including the width, height, and location. The token in this attribute is a RecordToken containing a field "bounds" with a 4-element integer array. There is also a field that indicates whether the window is maximized. By default, this attribute has visibility NONE, so the user will not see it in parameter editing dialogs.
